revised_title: Extension of Rational Polynomial Approximants with Branch Points
tldr: The article extends the existing scheme of rational polynomial approximants with branch points by defining diagonal approximants. The author introduces a prong structure to elucidate the properties of these approximants, which satisfy symmetry, projection, reciprocal covariance, and homographic covariance properties. The article focuses on the diagonal quadratic two-variable approximants and their properties.
